text: David D. Caron (June 28, 1952 - February 20, 2018) was an American professor of law. He was born in Hartford, Connecticut. He did public international law, environmental law, and international arbitration. He was the dean of the King's College, London School of Law, and an emeritus professor of UC Berkeley School of Law. Caron died on February 20, 2018 in London, England at the age of 65.Berkeley Law Professor Emeritus David Caron â€™83 Passes Away at 65David Caron: 1952-2018 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2018 deaths Category:University of California, Berkeley faculty Category:Academics of the University of London Category:Writers from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Lawyers from Connecticut
title: David Caron
